title: Liz Kendall – 2020 Statement on Exercise Cygnus
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Liz Kendall, the Shadow Social Care Minister, on 7 May 2020.
content:
The report on Exercise Cygnus provided clear warnings that we were not properly prepared for a pandemic.
